Title: An Act Converting the Calatrava Provincial High School in the Municipality of Calatrava, Province of Negros Occidental, into a National High School to be Known as the Calatrava National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 629
An Act Converting the Calatrava Provincial High School in the Municipality of Calatrava, Province of Negros Occidental, into a National High School to be Known as the Calatrava National High School
Section 1. The Calatrava Provincial High School in the Municipality of Calatrava, Province of Negros Occidental, is converted into a national high school to be known as the Calatrava National High School.
Section 2. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its share of national aid to local schools.1awp++i1 The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved: June 24, 1983
